Who am i

I'm Cosmin, a junior Front-end Developer who is very passionate about the work he does, I am looking forward to meet other developers and designers that i can help and learn from them new things. My main interest is to trak the latest web technologies and I am looking for an opportunity to extend my web development skills and knowledge.

More

Knowledge

I started to get more interested in web programming a few months ago since when i found some interesting lessons about styling websites using CSS and i liked it a lot because it involved a little creativity that is my favourite part. So i started to lean on my own, searching and practicing almost every day to get better and better.

About Me

I am a 21 year old student at Polytechnic University of Bucharest at the faculy of transports, on the Electronic engineering department.
A few months ago i heard about web programing and i found it out very interesting so i managed to learn by myself searching courses and tutorials on plenty of platforms. From now on I am looking to get hired for an opportunity to expand my knowledge and work, to become professional and to be the best.
In my opinion, I am a very devoted and involved team player, who seeks to offer the professionalism that i am capable of.
